description: As a Crossroads team member, you will represent our brand’s promise: to offer a fun, fashion-centered, and affordable shopping experience to our communities. You will engage with customers, educate them about our processes, and create a welcoming environment. You will also be responsible for cleaning, organizing, and merchandising the store.
responsibilities: Engage with customers, ask and educate them about selling their clothes, maintain a clean and organized store, and embody the core values of service, inclusion, and education.

qualifications.required: Must be able to work a minimum of 12 hours per week, have an interest in fashion and current trends, and be authorized to work in the United States.

benefits: 401(k), 401(k) matching, Dental insurance, Employee discounts, Flexible schedule, Health insurance, Opportunity for advancement, Training & development, Vision insurance, Wellness resources
